00021 using System;
00022 using System.Collections;
00023 
00024 using Niry;
00025 using Niry.Utils;
00026 using Niry.Network;
00027 
00028 using NyFolder;
00029 using NyFolder.Utils;
00030 using NyFolder.Protocol;
00031 
00032 namespace NyFolder.Protocol {
00033     public delegate void PeerSelectedHandler (object sender, UserInfo userInfo);
00034     public delegate void ProtocolLoginHandler (PeerSocket peer, UserInfo info);
00035     public delegate void ProtocolHandler (PeerSocket peer, XmlRequest xml);
00036     public delegate void SetProtocolEventHandler (P2PManager p2pManager);
00037 
00039     public static partial class CmdManager {
00040         // ============================================
00041         // PUBLIC (Default Commands) Events
00042         // ============================================
00044         public static event ProtocolLoginHandler LoginEvent = null;
00046         public static event ProtocolHandler QuitEvent = null;
00048         public static event ProtocolHandler ErrorEvent = null;
00050         public static event ProtocolHandler GetEvent = null;
00052         public static event ProtocolHandler AskEvent = null;
00054         public static event ProtocolHandler SndEvent = null;
00056         public static event ProtocolHandler SndStartEvent = null;
00058         public static event ProtocolHandler SndEndEvent = null;
00060         public static event ProtocolHandler SndAbortEvent = null;
00062         public static event ProtocolHandler RecvAbortEvent = null;
00064         public static event ProtocolHandler UnknownEvent = null;
00065 
00066         // ============================================
00067         // PUBLIC Events
00068         // ============================================
00070         public static event SetProtocolEventHandler AddProtocolEvent = null;
00072         public static event SetProtocolEventHandler DelProtocolEvent = null;
00073 
00074         // ============================================
00075         // PROTECTED Members
00076         // ============================================
00077 
00078         // ============================================
00079         // PRIVATE Members
00080         // ============================================
00081 
00082         // ============================================
00083         // PUBLIC Methods
00084         // ============================================
00086         public static void Initialize() {
00087             // Initialize Events (None)
00088             LoginEvent = null;
00089             QuitEvent = null;
00090             ErrorEvent = null;
00091             GetEvent = null;
00092             AskEvent = null;
00093             SndEvent = null;
00094             SndStartEvent = null;
00095             SndEndEvent = null;
00096             SndAbortEvent = null;
00097             RecvAbortEvent = null;
00098             UnknownEvent = null;
00099             AddProtocolEvent = null;
00100             DelProtocolEvent = null;
00101 
00102             // Setup Events
00103             P2PManager.StatusChanged += new BoolEventHandler(OnP2PStatusChanged);
00104         }
00105 
00106         // ============================================
00107         // PRIVATE (Methods) P2PManager Event Handlers
00108         // ============================================
00109         private static void OnP2PStatusChanged (object sender, bool status) {
00110             P2PManager p2pManager = P2PManager.GetInstance();
00111             if (status == true) {
00112                 // P2P Is Online
00113                 P2PManager.PeerReceived += new PeerEventHandler(OnReceived);
00114 
00115                 // Raise Add Protocol Event Handler
00116                 if (AddProtocolEvent != null) AddProtocolEvent(p2pManager);
00117             } else {
00118                 // Raise Delete Protocol Event Handler
00119                 if (DelProtocolEvent != null) DelProtocolEvent(p2pManager);
00120 
00121                 // P2P Is Offline
00122                 P2PManager.PeerReceived -= new PeerEventHandler(OnReceived);
00123             }
00124         }
00125 
00126         private static void OnReceived (object sender, PeerEventArgs args) {
00127             PeerSocket peer = sender as PeerSocket;
00128 
00129             // Get Response String and Check if is Valid Xml
00130             string xml = peer.GetResponseString();
00131             if (xml == null) return;
00132 
00133             // Remove Response Message
00134             peer.ResetResponse();
00135 
00136             // Get Xml Commands
00137             xml = xml.Trim();
00138             ArrayList xmlCmds = new ArrayList();
00139             lock (peer.Response) {
00140                 int splitPos = 0;
00141                 while ((splitPos = xml.IndexOf("><")) >= 0) {
00142                     // Add Xml Command To Cmds
00143                     string cmd = xml.Substring(0, splitPos + 1);
00144                     xmlCmds.Add(cmd);
00145 
00146                     // Remove Splitted Part
00147                     xml = xml.Remove(0, splitPos + 1);
00148                 }
00149 
00150                 if (XmlRequest.IsEndedXml(xml) == false) {
00151                     peer.Response.Insert(0, xml);
00152                 } else {
00153                     xmlCmds.Add(xml);
00154                 }
00155             }
00156             
00157             // Start New Command Parse Thread
00158             new CmdParser(peer, xmlCmds);
00159         }
00160 
00161         // ============================================
00162         // PRIVATE Methods
00163         // ============================================
00164 
00165         // ============================================
00166         // PUBLIC Properties
00167         // ============================================
00168     }
00169 }
